title: 1928-2024 MAUREEN TOD DIED PEA...
text:
1928-2024
Maureen Tod died peacefully in her 96th year, surrounded by her family, on Monday, May 13, 2024. Predeceased by her beloved husband, Charles (1925-2012). She leaves her daughter Cynthia, and her daughter Melanie and son-in-law Dr Don Brooks to love her forever.
Maureen was a force of nature — smart, quick, friendly, pretty, hard working, effective, genuine, both frugal and generous, gracious, kind, oh so funny, sweet, and always loving. Whatever she did she did with vigour and humour. She could do anything she tried — square and round dancing, bridge, X-C skiing, entertaining, cooking, cottage life, world travel, organizing, leadership in life and in volunteering, gardening, knitting (100s of pairs of mittens for cold children) and loving her family and her dogs with gusto. She was a devoted wife, a great mom and a fine human being. She will be sorely missed.
A memorial service will be held in the chapel of Hulse Playfair & McGarry, 315 McLeod St., Ottawa, on Thursday, May 30 at 3:30 p.m., followed by a reception. For Livestream of the service please visit
www.hpmcgarry.ca. For those who wish to make a donation in Maureen's memory please consider the Ottawa Hospital Foundation, or the Humane Society of Ottawa.
Condolences/Tributes/Donations
www.hpmcgarry.ca
613-233-1143
Published online May 25, 2024

Plant a tree: How does it work
When your purchase is complete, a post will be made on the tribute wall of the deceased signifying the planting of a memorial tree.
An official certificate recognizing your purchase will be included with your email receipt. You can then forward the email to the family or print it and give it to them personally.
After an order is placed, our forestry partners will plant the tree in the area of greatest need (nearest the funeral home), according to the planting schedule for the year.
Due to seasonal conditions, the tree planting takes place during the spring and summer.
Tree Planting Timeline
Orders placed in:
January - May
Planting will take place in Spring or Summer of the same year.
June - December
Planting will take place in Spring of the following year.
